review.title: Great hotel for a family
review.reviewText: Very positive. Good breakfast, clean and convenient location. Enjoyed my stay. Two bedrooms and two bath suites connected by a living room and kitchen. Shopping nearby for groceries. Free parking, 5 min walk to BART.

review.title: Group of 6
review.reviewText: My family had 6 people traveling together and the room accommodated us well. Breakfast was pretty okay too!

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel staffs are nice and accomodating. Quiet. Accessible to BART station.
review.positiveRemarks: Accessible to the train station, grocery & mall. Great staff.

review.title: Nice hotel walking distance to BART
review.reviewText: Had a great time, they offer a shuttle from the airport, allowed us early check in, room was very clean and modern, fantastic continental  breakfast.

review.title: Great for family and including the pets
review.reviewText: Stay here yearly for the Cow Palace dog show and is very comfortable and convenient. Close to nearby shopping and BJ's , Red Lobster and many more places to eat. Breakfast is good and for the price a great deal.

review.title: Perfact!!
review.reviewText:
Really nice hotel and breakfast.
I had great time.
Thank you so much.

review.title: Close to Target,Jcpenny malls. Near to Bart Statio
review.reviewText: It was a pleasant experience, enjoyed the stay.
review.positiveRemarks: Provide Breakfast, pick and drop from Airport. Staff cooperation is good.
review.locationRemarks: There is  Bart Station near by, Malls.

review.title: Convenient Location to SFO airport with homefeel
review.reviewText: Convenient Location to SFO airport with homefeeling. Just next to major shopping areas in the district.
Nice hotel, close to Oakland, Fisherman's Wharf and Golden Gate.

review.title: Nice hotel with easy access to San Francisco
review.reviewText: A short one block walk to the San Bruno Bart station and a $4.15 one way ride to downtown SF.  It was a great way to see SF without the hassle of a car and parking.  The hotel breakfast was simple but satisfying.  The food at socials during the week were tasty.  Good place for families with small children to safe money on food.  Lots of working folks staying there too.  With a supermarket across the street and gas grills outside and a kitchen inside, meals were no problem.  We ate most of our lunches and dinners out but having the option of making our own meals was great.  They do what they call light housekeeping if you are staying less than a week - means you get clean towels and a made up bed every day but sheets are not changed.  Pretty much what you'd do at home so it didn't bother us at all.  You also have the option of asking them to change sheets more frequently if you want.  Enjoyed the opportunity to meet other guests too.  Staff was always helpful.  Shuttle to/from SFO was very convenient and timely.
review.positiveRemarks: Just about everyting
review.negativeRemarks: We had a second floor room so getting our bags up the stairs was a bit difficult.  An elevator would have helped.
review.locationRemarks: Two shopping areas within 5 minute walk with supermarket, restaurants, retail stores and theaters.  BART station made getting into city simple.

review.reviewText: Nice and quiet place. I loved my staying at this hotel.
Nice, clean large rooms!! Breakfast was not the best but a Starbucks is right around the corner!

review.title: Good place for the family to stay (with a dog)
review.reviewText: The whole family stayed in a two room suite while the movers were packing and loading, then we flew out from SFO. A little small, and the bedroom doors are on diagonal walls - which is odd. But the abundance of free food was very convenient.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: This is a very nice and comfortable hotel. Stay like a home. Room is spacious and the kitchen is nicely equipped. Like it very much and will come back again!

review.title: Excellent hotel just outside San Fran
review.reviewText: Courteous and friendly staff, speedy check in, and wonderful room, comfortable beds, clean and relaxing.   The only issue was the 6.0 earthquake in the middle of the night :)
review.positiveRemarks: Their commitment to keeping it comfortable and quiet,  I was informed by staff that they had a "no party" policy, strictly enforced.
review.locationRemarks: We ventured into the city, and went to fishermans warf, 30 minute drive.

review.title: Trip to San Fran
review.reviewText: Pleasant staff. Large clean rooms. Family of five fit comfortably. Close to freeway and grocery store. Was a great 'home base' for our forays into the city. Included breakfast and occasional meals in the kitchenette tampered the high price of eating out in San Francisco.
review.positiveRemarks: Pool, hot tub, value, free breakfast, proximity to freeway
review.locationRemarks: Near airport. We decided to not get a hotel in the city, opting instead for a rental car. Worked out quite well.

review.title: All the comforts of home.
review.reviewText: Clean, cozy and comfortable, plus a welcoming staff and awesome breakfast. Even complimentary laundry room! We loved it here. Only thing to be aware of: the jets flying right over. Very close to airport, after all. This is a benefit, as well, of course. Got to the airport quickly on the airport shuttle. If you need a ride to/from the airport, just let them know. The shuttle is not on a schedule.

review.title: Great hotel and location!
review.reviewText: We only stayed one night.  The room was excellent, right near airport which was a little noisy but convenient.  Hotel had an excellent setup for a large family.  Very clean.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, convenient, large suite.
review.negativeRemarks: Although it is a nonsmoking hotel, our room smelled like people had smoked in it.
review.locationRemarks: Airport, shopping, cinema

review.title: Comfortable for 6
review.reviewText: The entire group was thrilled with the location close to the airport and mall.  The room was clean and comfortable for all of us.  The breakfasts and fun taco night were enjoyed by everyone.  We were warned ahead about the proximitiy to the airport and flight noise, so we came prepared with earplugs.  (You do need them).  All in all, we enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay there again.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness and friendly staff.
review.locationRemarks: It is near a mall and close to the airport.

review.title: Impressive Staff!
review.reviewText:
We enjoyed our stay very much! We found the staff very accommodating. The complimentary breakfast was good and the staff worked hard to keep things supplied, the tables clean and the serving areas clean.  We had one of the comp dinners (burgers) and enjoyed them very much. The burgers were grilled outdoors on one of their barbecues. We had an issue with a slow drain in one of the bathrooms. We mentioned it to the front desk and it was taken care of when we returned later that same day. There were other requests made of the staff and they were accomadated. 
Other than sofa bed bedding that continually shifted and bunched up (minor) we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
review.positiveRemarks: The staff worked hard and were friendly.
review.locationRemarks: The location was great for us for visiting friends and relatives and for sightseeing on the SF waterfront.

review.title: Visit to San Francisco
review.reviewText: We chose the staybridge for our family of six hoping a suite would avoid the need to book two rooms.  Unfortunately, the staybridge was extremely tight for my husband and me, three teens and a 10 year old.  There is no room for a rollaway and the small beds don't offer much room to share....6 is just too many for their rooms. Also, the hotel is directly in the flight path - landing or taking off from SFO - and the jet noise is crazy loud. It is close the highway for easy access to the city and there are plenty of national chain restaurants around the corner to choose from... but why would you??  You're in SF - head to the city and experience the food found at the neighborhood restaurants!,  the breakfast revive was spotty. There was only one woman working bf each morning and it was a lot for her to keep up with.  The hot water for tea for roomt temperature and requests to make to hotter went unanswered.  Do not even think about arriving for breakfast close to the 9:30 AM cutoff - everything will be removed and items will not be re-filled.
review.positiveRemarks: Free laundry, convenience to highway, in-room kitchen
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is directly in line w SFO flights and it is loud all day/night. There are chain restaurants and shopping close by.  30 minute ride into SF.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: Friendly staff. Great value close to the airport with free wifi, parking and breakfast
review.positiveRemarks: As above

review.title: excellent stay..recommended
review.reviewText: perfect....manager on duty was helpful and very nice...she had good customer service..breakfast excellent..
review.positiveRemarks: everything..fro staffing to cleanliness excellent..will stay again on this hotel ..

review.title: Bad Service except for one person
review.reviewText: The place a great with all the amenities you could want, but the service at the front desk was really bad. But it was made up by one person (James) who really helped turn it around.

review.title: good choice in SFO
review.reviewText: very close to the airport, free parking, free wifi, free breakfast ...
review.positiveRemarks: very close to the airport

review.title: Staybridge, San Bruno, CA
review.reviewText: Nice place. Great 2 bedroom. Good breakfast. Close to airport.
review.positiveRemarks: 2 bedrooms.
review.negativeRemarks: some of the wood railings need replacement.

review.title: Lots of space but very uncomfortable
review.reviewText:
Lots of room to spread out, which was great for a family of 5. But plastic covers on the beds meant that every time you turned over you were woken by the crinkling noise. If you stayed very still you were awoken by the airplane noise. Breakfast was very ordinary as well.
Take the plastic off the beds and improve breakfast and this hotel would definitely rate higher.

review.title: Great place for a big family
review.reviewText: Stayed Thanksgiving evening and after a busy day loved the accommodations of two separate bedrooms and two bathrooms for our family with four kids. Well worth it!!

review.title: GREAT hotel for families.
review.reviewText: I have a large family-4 kids-and we stayed in a 2 bdrm suite and had room to spare. We usually can't stay longer than 2 nights anywhere because my husband and I are exhausted from waking up all night sleeping near noisy kids. The Staybridge Suites solved that problem. We were all ready to move in permanently! Our room was inside the courtyard next to the bball court and pool areas. It was so convenient. The breakfast was varied and fresh each day. The business center was accessible and easy to use. The rooms were clean, the beds were comfortable, the drapes blacked out a room sufficiently. There's a TV in every room (3) so there was no fighting in the evenings when we were calming down. When outdoors, the airplanes can be loud, but none of us noticed that while inside buildings. It is convenient to restaurants, shopping, airport, dt San Francisco (7-8miles). San Bruno isn't exactly a beautiful area, but we felt safe and overall enjoyed our vacation very much based out of this hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Not always an employee at the front desk (but we never waited long).
review.locationRemarks: Chuck E Cheese, (Tanforan sp?)shopping mall, Red Robin, Chili's, Safeway, Target, Movie theater

review.title: Nice facilities, excellent breakfast!
review.reviewText: This hotel is very nice. It's basically a little apartment, with an equipped kitchen (microwave, sink, full-size fridge, dishwasher, etc.), a living room with a nice couch ottoman and chair and a tv. The bedroom is sealed off with a set of doors and includes a walk in closet right next to the bathroom. We loved the breakfast, the staff was very friendly, however they would constantly knock for house keeping, even though we had the signs up to not disturb. This needs to be sorted out, because it's very annoying. The beds are small, and only slightly comfortable. The size of the "Room" makes up for most of that, though.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast, room size
review.negativeRemarks: House keeping needs to pay attention to the 'Do No Disturb' signs
review.locationRemarks: Very close to BART transportation and shopping center, few restaurants. Post office right next door for sending post cards, etc.

review.title: Lovely hotel close to airport and easy to get to.
review.reviewText: Loved our stay, wish is was longer. Staff on the first day were friendly and helpful. Rooms were comfortable. We needed to leave the hotel at 6.30am and breaks was included in our package. We were disappointed that breakfast service doesn't begging until 7.30am. When you have a hotel near the airport I would suggest break at should begin at 5.30am. We left hungry and get an opportunity to eat until dinner time after a long flight. Other than that we loved our stay.
review.positiveRemarks: Loved the space for a family of 7. Beautifully appointed rooms and full kitchen.
review.negativeRemarks: For a hotel near the airport offering free hot breakfast, we think they should start it at 6am not 7.30. We missed out and hd been looking forward to

review.title: Excellent rooms at a good rate
review.reviewText: Great place to stay. Very comfortable rooms. Excellent free breakfast. The downsides are that the pool is very small, and planes flying overhead are not WAY too loud, but if you're a very light sleeper you may have a hard time with that.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast was amazing both days.

review.title: suite hotel
review.reviewText:
we checked in close 4 am. FO Clerk was, in my opinion, unprofessional looking- shirt almost tucked out, and his hair was not appropriate. He was friendly but seemed uncomfortable in what he was doing.

Room was very nice! Nicely appointed. Dishwashers was on the older side. Coffee maker could use a little cleaning. Time on both coffee maker and cd player in room were wrong.

Breakfast was filling. Saturday bfast, there were no plates and utensils, this was almost 10 am. However, eggs were nice, in fact to perfectly beaten and the sausages were very good. Good variety of coffee and juices.

review.title: One of the best hotels I've been!
review.reviewText: My expectations on the hotel was absolutely met. My husband and I were very happy to book on this hotel, it made his birthday celebration awesome! It has everthing so you would feel the comfort that you're in your own home. Everything and every corner is clean, geat facilities and very nice renovation. We'll definitely come back here when we go to San Francisco again. =)
review.positiveRemarks: The location, interior design of the room, amenities and facilities looks very new.
review.negativeRemarks: Let the customer know that they will charge an insurance fee at time of check-in. I was surprise that they credited a 1 night rate on my card.
review.locationRemarks: It's very near on the BART transpo and on the san bruno town center everything is there.

review.title: Overnight stay
review.reviewText: Clean, comfortable, convenient hotel with a friendly professional staff.

review.title: Newly renovated
review.reviewText: Feels homy when I was there. Nice decor. Looks like a condo with all the kitchen facilities. Great 2 bedroom enough space for 5 of us. Breakfast and 4 evening social meals per week , all complimentary. Free wine for people who want to drink.
review.positiveRemarks: Free WiFi, parking, breakfast. Homy atmosphere. Close to shopping and groceries shopping ( accross the street ), easy access to freeways
review.locationRemarks: Easy access to San Fran and other surrounding areas.

review.title: Nice hotel for a family stay
review.reviewText: The hotel was very clean and convenient. Professional and friendly staff made our stay very comfortable. In the future, we will definitely stay at a Staybridge hotel!
review.positiveRemarks: Hotel room was spacious and recently remodeled. Pool area and room was very clean and well attended to and they offered a great breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Near airport and shopping mall, easy access from main freeway and quiet neighborhood within 20 minutes to several tourist sites.

review.title: nice hotel close to shopping mall
review.reviewText: Everything is good except for no heavy blanket, it's cold in the night
review.positiveRemarks: Very much
review.negativeRemarks: Blanket is the only thing I felt unsatisfactory

review.title: Great hotel for families or groups of 4 to 6,
review.reviewText:
We had 3 adults women and 3 girls ranging from 11 to 66 our trip to S.F. I found this hotel with suites for a great price on Expedia months before our trip. We had 2 bedrooms with queen beds, 2 bathrooms, 3 TVs and a full kitchen. It was all greatly appreciated with 6 of us especially the bathrooms! We had a full complimentary breakfast and Tues thru Thurs there is food and adult beverages and soda for the kids from 5:30 to 7pm.

The location was great too! Being in San Bruno, near the SF airport, you are only a short ride into the Pier 39 area by freeway. Parking is convenient at the Pier 39 Parking Garage. We went for the day came back to swim in the pool and have food in the afternoon and then went back to ride the cable cars in the evening and shop at Pier 39. You avoid the crowds and congestion going back in the evening.

I would certainly come back to this hotel on future trips to SF, especially with a group of friends or family.

review.title: Great place for families with teenage children.
review.reviewText: Newly remodeled hotel. Plenty of room for the four of us. Shuttle to and from airport and locally if needed. Close to airport, but airplane noise not bothersome. Excellent breakfast buffet for all. Laundry room on site for use clean and free. Computer for use. Staff does excellent job cleaning room. Outdoor pool available, but its kind of cool there so we didn't use it. Great General Manager-Lisa, very pleasant. About 8 miles south of San Francisco. Can take public transportation or rent a car. We spent 7 nights there. Location near changing area so best not to leave things visible in car. However, we felt very safe there (Nice mall just a 1/2 block from hotel and new upscale housing just the other side of the mall).
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, roomy, great breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: Mattresses were a little too firm.
review.locationRemarks: Mall and a few restaurants within 1/2 mile of hotel. Yes, there is traffic, but not worse than in our own metropolitan area.

review.title: Family of Five in San Francisco
review.reviewText: We are a family of 5, staying in SF for two days. An excellent location for city and airport. We caught the Bart to the city in 25 minutes and spent a day there. The hotel airport shuttle was fast and efficient. Two bedroom suite was fantastic for our family. Plenty of space and cooking facilities. Just across the road from a grocery store.
review.positiveRemarks: Location to SFO and city

review.title: Great home base for visiting San Francisco area!
review.reviewText: The hotel was spacious and clean. We were four women's traveling together and each had our own bed.
review.positiveRemarks: The size of the room.
review.locationRemarks: A little tricky to find, but near lots of shopping and restaurants.

review.title: Great hotel for anyone wanting to be comfortable.
review.reviewText: I live in the South SF area and my family from Utah visits and stays in various hotels when they come to San Francisco. This was the first time I booked this hotel and will be the only one we use moving forward. Well decorated and beautiful rooms, great staff, fun pool, a great breakfast plus evening snacks, business center and a very helpful security guard. It was a great experience and the cost for a 2 bedroom suite was very reasonable. My mom, brother and nephews stayed there for 4 nights last week and we really love it there.
review.positiveRemarks: Beautiful suite with a great breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Close to freeways, across the street from a big mall and theatre.

review.title: Hotel perfect for Business/Leisure Stay
review.reviewText: It is my second time staying at Staybridge Suites - San Bruno. They have renovated the rooms and kept the facilities well-maintained.
review.positiveRemarks: Hearty breakfast buffets, laundry & fitness facilities, and complete kitchen utensils and equipment.
review.negativeRemarks: The daily Light-Touch Cleaning could be improved to better clean the rooms. Also, they must offer cleaning services on weekends w/o scheduling.
review.locationRemarks: Perfect location because it is near Tanforan Mall and BART.

review.title: Great stay
review.reviewText: We've stayed in many different hotels in San Fran and found that Staybridge meets our needs the most. The price is right, close to the airport, shopping center, market, easy access and parking. A plus is that it's a suite so a separate bedroom is nice since my wife and I have different wake up times. I can have a leisurely breakfast with paper then bring a takeout for my wife. Freeway access is close by so driving into town or to Gilroy/Monteray is very easy.
review.positiveRemarks: Hotel just got remodeled. Close to many amenities
review.locationRemarks: Great location since it's close to Tanforan Shopping Center and a supermarket.

review.title: Great place for family.
review.reviewText:
We stayed in the hotel from 12/25 through 12/31/12. There was no cleaning done during the last 3 days of our stay, Kleenex, toilet paper, towels were not replaced. This was very unusual as we have stayed in the Staybridge Suites before, and never faced this problem.
Appreciated that the hotel provided shuttle service to the nearest restaurant on Dec 25th as everything was closed on Christmas Day.
review.positiveRemarks: Pillows.
review.locationRemarks: Wonderful.

review.title: Great for short or long term stays
review.reviewText: Comfortable rooms and great breakfast..Very close to sfo international airport
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast
review.locationRemarks: great location ..close to mall and airport

review.title: Hotel Recommended
review.reviewText: The hotle was in the middle of a renovation so the outside looked a little half-way finished. Rooms and Main lobby were nicely maintianed. The meals were good. I'd definitely stay here again.

review.title: Great for families, accommodating staff
review.reviewText: Hotel staff was so cooperative in letting us stay past checkout time--I wasn't feeling well and not able to leave the hotel. Hotel was clean and beds were comfortable. Suite was roomy and just right for my husband and I, our two children, and my sister.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice-sized kitchen area with stove, micro, fridge, fully stocked
review.locationRemarks: Close to BART and airport

review.title: Wonderful Deal for Families
review.reviewText: My husband, myself, and our 2 teenage children recently spent a week at the Staybridge Suites in San Francisco. We were all extremely happy with the accommodations, we stayed in a 2 bedroom suite, it was very clean and comfortable. A kitchen area was very well stocked with whatever one would need to prepare meals in the room, a grill was available outside for barbecuing as well. The daily breakfasts provided were much more than adequate. Everyday there were eggs, meat, fresh fruits, yogurts, juices. bagels, muffins, cooked oatmeal, and coffee available. Outside we enjoyed the basketball court, swimming pool, and spa. The location is also convenient and close to shopping centers and restaurants. If I go back to San Francisco again for vacation I would definitely stay here again!
review.negativeRemarks: Outside we occasionally heard airplanes overhead.

review.title: Great staff, nice location. I'd recommend it.
review.reviewText: Nice location, everything was in good condition, a few little blemishes here and there but clean and nice. Staff was very friendly and helpful, the free breakfast was great, lots of variety and even the eggs were good. It is near the airport so be prepared for some intense aircraft Lise at times. I was actually very worried about that but when it came time for bed I didn't notice any noise from the airport. The suite is nice sized, two bathrooms was a great feature.
review.positiveRemarks: Size
review.locationRemarks: Convent on and off the freeway. Lots of stores and eateries.

review.title: Minnesota Family Enjoys Staybridge Suites
review.reviewText: The breakfast buffet was simply delicious every day with a variety of options - kids loved the waffles and french toast, while I loved the oatmeal and fresh fruits. Dinner menu was also very good. Friendly and courteous staff! We had a wonderful stay! Thank you!
review.positiveRemarks: The breakfast buffet!

review.title: older staybridge
review.reviewText: older hotel. beds were too soft. We were on the ground floor and the cleaning staff start rolling their carts early in the morning, hence noisy.
review.positiveRemarks: none
review.locationRemarks: near airport

review.title: Great stay, we would stay here again.
review.reviewText: We have 3 young adults. This 2 bedroom suite has set up like an apartment with 2 bathrooms and a kitchen with dishware, pans, even a water pitcher. The desk person when we arrived at 10:30 p.m. was extremely nice and gave us directions on how to use the Bart to get some place. The only thing wrong was being woke up in the middle of the night from a jet that flew over us. Very startling, but we did stay near the airport, so it was expected. Overall a very nice place to stay. Breakfast was great.
review.positiveRemarks: 2 bathrooms, great when you have girls
review.locationRemarks: Next to Bart station and mall

review.title: Family Vacation
review.reviewText: We rented a 2 bedroom suite and the suite was perfect for my family of 5. The service was not the best. Everytime I went downstairs to the lobby, there was nobody at the front counter.
review.positiveRemarks: The suite was amazing and perfect.
review.negativeRemarks: The service could have been better
review.locationRemarks: The location was perfect, right across the street from the mall.

review.title: Not as nice as expected
review.reviewText: The beds are very uncomfortable and we didn't get the room we had reserved. But the staff was polite and tried to make up for the let downs.

review.title: Would definitely go back.
review.reviewText:
Stayed in three other hotels on El Camino Drive but this the best so far.
Met most of our requirements we wanted. Free shuttle, breakfast, full kitchen, newspaper, parking, and separate bedroom. Not a high end but met our requirements. Two shopping centers across the street with lots of eating places and a large grocery market. Staff was very nice and helpful. Car rental was two blocks away so didn't have to pay for airport fees and saved on a extra day. Would have liked to have a door to the bedroom in lieu of a cased opening. Some would not like the aircraft noise once in a while but did not bother us. Furniture was a little outdated but clean.
For the price well worth it.
review.locationRemarks: Often times would arrive evenings and a shuttle service to the hotel near the airport is convenient. Next day would rent a car from a car rental near the hotel. Renting a car at the airport costs more and we can also save a day's rental by renting the next day. Hotels on or near El Camino Drive offer many places for eating and shopping make it easy for options. From this location we can drive down to Gilroy/Monteray or into San Fran.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Perfect hotel for families. The location is perfect! You have the mall, markets, movie theater and plenty of restaurants a block away.... I would definitely stay here again... Ruben

review.title: A pleasant surprise!
review.reviewText: I recently spent a week at the Staybridge Suites and was very pleased with this property. This is a busy place filled with travelers and contractors, who must be working in the local area. The hotel itself is very convenient to the airport and a BART station just one block away. The rooms are very clean and the beds comfortable. The morning breakfast buffet (included with the room rate) is ample to start your day with plenty of coffee and soft drinks on hand. There is a free on site laundry and the front desk staff are very attentive. The on site manager was especially gracious. One evening I had a small problem with my room. The manager immediately took care of it, wrote me a note of apology and the next day I found a box of chocolates in my room. Despite the close proximity to the airport, the area is relatively quiet. There are plenty of restaurants in the immediate area as well as a suburban shopping mall. I would definitely recommend the Staybridge Suites and will stay their again on my next trip.

review.title: GREAT LOCATION
review.reviewText: THIS WAS MY 2ND VISIT TO THIS HOTEL, WONDERFUL LOCATION, PLENTY OF SHOPPING NEAR BY, RESTAURANTS ACROSS THE STREET. THE PEOPLE AT THE FRONT DESK ARE FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL. TRULY ENJOYED THE BREAKFAST ITEMS, INCLUDING HOT ITEMS, YOGURT, FRUITS, AND WAFFLES, OATMEAL ETC. ALL THE ROOMS COME WITH A FULL EQUIPPED KITCHEN, ALSO VERY CLOSE TO THE FREEWAY. iF YOU STAY HERE YOU WON'T BE DISAPOINTED.

review.title: California in 11 Days
review.reviewText:
We had only one problem with this hotel stay and that was on the first night, around 11pm, we noticed a wet stain on the sheets & mattress of the sofa bed. The front desk offered extra mattress pads and sheets (which, with some plastic bags got us through the night). The next night the problem had been fixed (i.e. the mattress was dry).

Other than this, the hotel was clean and comfortable. The buffet breakfast was fine and the staff were pleasant.

The hotel location was good (close to a large shopping mall, the airport and to two Interstates which get you to downtown SF).

The internet connection was not consistent

review.title: Perfect family hotel with several convenient amenities
review.reviewText:
This hotel was perfect for our family. We needed a room that could accommodate 6 adults and the two bedroom suit worked great. There are 2 full baths, a kitchen, and 3 TVs to accommodate all. The free breakfast was very good with a wide variety of eggs, waffles or pancakes, cereal, breads, fruits, etc. They also provided free wi-fi in all rooms and there is a business center with 2 computers and printers for guest to use free as well. The staff was always pleasant and very helpful.
This hotel is about 3 miles north of SF airport and about 11 miles south of the center of SF. The BART (subway) station was a short walk away (about the same a 2 city blocks) and the round trip daily ticket was reasonable. The ride is about 20 - 25 minuts long which was fine for us. Parking in the city is a major problem and expensive so this was a great alternative.
If you have a family and do not mind staying outside the city, you will save some money and accommodations will suit you just fine.

review.title: Great place to stay if you want to be close to the airport and ok to drive to downtown San Fransisco
review.reviewText: Nice place to stay for a family. Great swimming pool. Good breakfast. Conveniently located.

review.title: Staybridge Stay
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel. Clena dand smoke free. Breakfast was good. Lots of eating joints close by and very close to the highway.

review.title: Not Happy
review.reviewText: We stayed at the Staybridge in Anaheim so were expecting a similar standard but unfortunately the San Francisco Staybridge was not great. The facilities were ok but the staff were not good. Their grasp of English was poor therefore hard to communicate sometimes.Some rude. Coffee & tea had quite frequently run out. No everyday hot tea was available at breakfast but all the flavoured tea which I found totally unexceptable. Noise was a problem not only with planes but with people on the level above. If this hotel sorted it's problems then could be good but would not recommend as it is now

review.title: Good place for families
review.reviewText:
Very nice place for families. Clean and comfortable. Good breakfast and free laundry machine. Some nice resterunts in the close area.
The only problem that it is not inside SF.

review.title: Good Value
review.reviewText: Location was great. I liked the buffet breakfast.Very close to a great mall and Lucky grocery store.I would definitly stay there again.

review.title: Good Budget hotel
review.reviewText: The manager was very helpful when we asked for a change in rooms. Climbing 2 flights of stairs was extremely difficult, so she not only got us a ground floor room, but had our bags moved for us while we were out. The noise from the airport can be bad at times, but the beds are good and a full kitchen was nice. Free parking for our rental car was also very nice.

review.title: Smart choice
review.reviewText: Good location close to airport and Bart train (15 minutes to downtown), large and well appointed suites, free parking, free breakfast, reasonable rates for San Francisco. The Staybridge is not a deluxe property, nor a rundowm motel, but a solid and well serviced "middle of the road" hotel for smart travellers.

review.title: Too noisy
review.reviewText: The hotel itself was fine; good service, clean, extra large. But, we were traveling with three kids and the hotel is right under the airplanes flying overhead. The planes were loud enough to set off car alarms. We could hear planes from about 6:30am-10pm It was too hard for our family to sleep. It would be a great place if you don't mind the noisy planes!

review.title: Nice Place
review.reviewText: very close to the airport not far from Downtown if you have a car, also very close to a groceary store and a mall with movie theaters, minutes from SFO airport

review.title: Very Comfortable and Spacious
review.reviewText: Our family of 5 spent 4 nights at the Staybridge Suites San Bruno. Very comfortable suite with 2 seperate bedrooms (each with its own en-suite), a fold down couch and a complete kitchen. Pool area was nice, full breakfast was included. 1 block away from a mall, theatre, restaurants and groceries. BART is right there to get you to downtown San Fran. Close to all major highways.

review.title: Very nice hotel
review.reviewText: Very clean and good room size. It is a very nice to spent your vacation in San Francisco. Free laundry full time and a very nice breakfast.

review.title: Comfortable but not as nice as some Staybridge's
review.reviewText: Adequate

review.title: Great For Families
review.reviewText: With two bedrooms, two bathrooms, three beds and a pull-out couch, not to mention free buffet breakfasts, this hotel was great for our family of five. The hotel is also close to the San Francisco airport and the San Bruno BART station.

review.title: Great Place for Business
review.reviewText: If you need a place to stay for business, Staybridge Suites is the place to stay.

review.title: Great Place to Stay in San Francisco
review.reviewText: This Hotel was in a great location. It had great amenities such as the exercise room, a heated pool and hot tub. The free breakfast every morning was good and made for a great way to start the day. The only negative thing that we experienced was our room was not cleaned unless we requested it.

review.title: Unexpected Comfortable Stay
review.reviewText: Very impressed with the comfortability, cleanliness, and location. The free breakfast buffet was delicious! I will not be surprised if Staybridges will soon be promoted to 4 stars
